title: Confessing
description: Note: Confessing is the third book in the Fighting series. It is not a standalone book. Please read Lying first.Spencer fought hard for everything he wanted, but in one night, his life is ripped open and he's left broken and bleeding. How could everything happen so fast? How could he let this happen at all?August has questions. Way too many questions and not enough answers. What really happened? Who can she trust? Who should she really believe? Who would believe her?Tim and Susie from Pleasantville are officially fugitives on the run, and the truth isn't always as simple as it seems.Reader discretion is advised for graphic violence, explicit language and sexual content.
author: Cat Phoenix
